conbody.p: After starting the run command, the tunnel client does two things:

ul.li: Spin up a fresh virtual machine (VM) that is used only for testing.
Connect you to the TestCloud Tunnel server.

conbody.p: By default, the tunnel is closed after 30 minutes if there is no request or traffic (i.e. the tunnel is idle for 30 minutes). Consequently, the VM is shut down.
To start the tunnel again, enter the run command in the tunnel client.
